pages.text: $(li)The Redstone Dust is electric mineral with electric propierties that can be found and mined in the Caves.$(br)$(li)It can be found in Loot Chests too and Witches drops this item when they are slayed.

$(li)The Redstone Dust is a good material to brew your potions. With it, you can extend the duration of the effects of your brewed potions.$(br)$(li)The Redstone Dust can transmit Redstone Power when placed on the ground. With your ingenuity, you could create advanced machines and circuits using this material.$(br)$(li)The Redstone Dust can be used in a crafting table to craft multiples items too.
